constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: A4D Storage and distribution to residential

decision_conditions: <p>The proposed development, by reason of poor layout and inadequate space would result in the provision of inadequate and unsuitable cycle parking. As such the proposed development is contrary to policies T1 (Strategic Approach to Transport), T4 (Assessing and Mitigating Transport Impacts) and T5 (Cycling) of the London Plan 2021, policies LP42 (Walking and Cycling) and LP43 (Transport and Development) of the Local Plan 2033(2020) and the guidance contained within Hackney Transport Strategy.<br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8c0db620-7fff-9945-1ad8-00ab0fb1fd8f"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed development, would result in sub-standard accommodation by virtue of lack of space, insufficient levels of light and outlook to the detriment of future occupiers</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">. As such the proposed development is contrary to policy D6 (Housing Quality and Standards) of London Plan 2021 and policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP17 (Housing Design) of the Local Plan 2033 and the guidance contained within the Mayor of London's Housing SPG.</span></p>

<p>The proposed development, by reason of the complete and unacceptable loss of the topsoil of the rear garden would fail to protect or promote biodiversity contrary to policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP47 (Biodiversity and Sites of Importance of Nature Conservation) of the Hackney Local Plan 2020.<br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-0f53c271-7fff-4497-1f4a-d60e6c14c230"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Insufficient information regarding flooding and groundwater impacts from the basement excavation has been submitted with this application to demonstrate the proposed works would not increase potential flooding on site and the surrounding area contrary to LP53 (Water and Flooding) of the Hackney Local Plan (2020).  </span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e0201c59-7fff-0a39-015a-8aaf3dd389b1"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Insufficient information regarding trees has been submitted with this application. The Local Planning Authority is therefore unable to fully assess the merits or otherwise of this proposal and its impact on existing trees, contrary to LP51 (Tree Management and Landscaping) of the Local Plan 2033 (2020). </span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-11bdd3cc-7fff-031d-2568-4e23a6399ccf"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed development, in the absence of a legal agreement to contribute towards the Carbon Offset Fund,&nbsp; would fail to meet the London Objective of being a zero-carbon city by 2050, contrary to policies SI 2 (Minimising greenhouse gas emissions) of the London Plan (2021), policy&nbsp; LP55 (Mitigating Climate Change) of Hackney’s Local Plan 2033 (2020) and Hackney's S106 Planning Contributions SPD (2020).</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed development, in the absence of a legal agreement to secure car-free housing, would be likely to promote the use of non-sustainable modes of transport and contribute to air pollution and congestion in the surrounding area, contrary to policies T6 (Car Parking) of the London Plan (2021), policy LP45 (Parking and Car Free Development) of Hackney’s Local Plan 2033 (2020) and Hackney's S106 Planning Contributions SPD (2020).</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-311cd613-7fff-bfcd-af19-6045c4895fa7"><br></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed development, in the absence of genuinely affordable housing or a legal agreement to secure a contribution in lieu towards affordable housing fails to deliver the maximum reasonable amount of affordable housing and is therefore contrary to policy H4 (Delivering affordable housing) of the London Plan (2021), policy LP13 (Affordable housing) of Hackney’s Local Plan 2033 (2020) and Hackney's S106 Planning Contributions SPD (2020).</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-377cc5f1-7fff-88e6-3fcf-75439b5fb052"><br></span></p>
description: Erection of a new residential dwelling of 3 storeys plus basement to provide 5 x self contained residential units,with associated private and communal amenity space, cycle and refuse/recycling storage
